#include <stdio.h>
int val=1000000007;
int main()
{
   int N,K,m,ans;
   int inv=(val+1)/3;
   scanf("%d%d%d",&N,&K,&m);
   int t2,t3;
   t2=((long long)N*N)%val;
   t3=((long long)t2*N)%val;
   if(K==1)ans=m;
   else if(K==2)
   {
       int t1=((long long)2*N-1)%val;
       if(t1<0)t1+=val;
       ans=((long long)t1*m)%val;
   }
   else if(K==3)
   {
       int t1=((long long)2*t2-2*N+1)%val;
       if(t1<0)t1+=val;
       ans=((long long)t1*m)%val;
   }
   else if(K==4)
   {
       int t1=((long long)4*t3-6*t2+8*N-3)%val;
       if(t1<0)t1+=val;
       ans=((long long)t1*inv)%val;
       ans=((long long)ans*m)%val;
   }
   else
   {
       int t1=((long long)t2-N)%val;
       if(t1<0)t1+=val;
       int temp=((long long)t1*(t1+4))%val;
       temp=((long long)2*temp)%val;
       temp=((long long)temp*inv)%val;
       ans=((long long)(temp+1)*m)%val;
   }
   printf("%d\n",ans);
    return 0;
}
